channel.title: Andrzej Sapkowski on Atharva Shah
channel.description: Recent content in Andrzej Sapkowski on Atharva Shah

item.title: The Best Quotes from The Witcher Series by Andrzej Sapkowski
item.description: The Last Wish You make as good a fisherman as a goat’s arse makes a trumpet. “Kings,” continued Calanthe, “divide people into two categories—those they order around, and those they buy—because they adhere to the old and banal truth that everyone can be bought. “The sun shines differently, the air is different, water is not as it used to be. The things we used to eat, made use of, are dying, diminishing, deteriorating.
